1301 BREAKING: At least TEN Senate Democrats are expected to vote in favor of a “short term funding measure” today to END the Schumer Shutdown, per Axios posted 3 days ago by _C_I_A_ 112 comments award share download report block
112 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save mattytr 116 points 3 days ago No money for illegals. No money for "foreign aid". I know a lot of people here won’t care if their families are in driving distance but that doesn’t apply to a large part of the country. Take the CR until Christmas time, then when the Dems play chicken again in December and call everyone Scrooge, then cave to show your holiday spirit. This is standard operating procedure from these as..hats for the last 30 years. This is how we got Obamacare, if that offers some perspective on how long this business has been going on. Both parties. Doesn't matter who has the WH. They all do it. Uniparty. And Trump's still got far too few allies to plow through. permalink parent award report block reply alfredbester 4 points 3 days ago This is the sad truth. CR = continuing resolution. The bill authorizes current Biden era spending levels to continue into December to allow more time to negotiate. Speaker Johnson has offered this since September. It's been sitting in the Senate waiting for Schumer to ok it this long. ------ How this will work ------ This will work the same way it does every damn year we do this. Dems are going to hold out until Christmas when everyone's feeling generous and wants to be home with their families. Then Schumer's going to make wild demands and hold the government hostage and tell them they can't celebrate Christmas until they vote. The Republicans will cave and Dems get to play Santa Claus to illegals once again with our money because the GOP is too afraid to FIGHT. If the GOP decides to show some spine, the best we'll get at the end of that stunt is another CR to get us to March, and we'll do the same game of chicken again, this time with tax season looming and businesses screaming demanding certainty in the laws so they can plan their budgets. Then the donors get involved in the pressure campaign. And usually the GOP will cave because they're too afraid to FIGHT. permalink award report block reply victory2024 9 points 3 days ago "Biden era spending levels" -- so funding illegals will continue? permalink parent award report block reply KekistanPM 4 points 3 days ago If congressmen and senators didn't get paid during a shutdown, you can be sure the government would be open right now. permalink parent award report block reply Dangerous -2 points 3 days ago The GOP isn't afraid. Any school receiving federal money for meals that cannot show that all children come from citizen households by the end of the month stops getting money December 1st. Any bank that cannot show that all account holders have legal status in the US by the end of the month are red-lined and removed from FDIC programs on December 1st. All lenders who cannot prove that a creditor in collection is a US citizen by the end of the month will be barred from seeking relief in federal court. All states that do not provide full SNAP accounting by the end of the month lose all SNAP payments. All states that do not provide full commercial and non-commercial driver's licenses audit by the end of the month lose all federal highway matching funds. Merry Christmas America.
